amendment.description: Amendment prohibits funds in the Act to be used to implement any section added by a previous specified amendment except for activities related to planning and management of national monuments.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit funds in the Act to be used to implement any section added by a previous specified amendment except for activities related to planning and management of national monuments.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Nethercutt amendment (A026) Agreed to by recorded vote: 197 - 180 (Roll no. 288).
